title: View issue / merge request state in unfurled issue link in Slack
description:
### Background
- When an issue is pasted in Slack, the link is unfurled, and certain fields of the issue are displayed in a preview.
- We want to provide more integration and enable users to stay in Slack if they need to.

### Description
- View the issue state (open, closed) in the preview.
- Same for merge requests (open, closed, merged).

### References
https://api.slack.com/docs/message-link-unfurling

milestone.title: Backlog (Accepting merge requests)
milestone.description: Issues that we want to do but are not planned right now. Open for contribution from the community.
